title: "Eye Contact" (4 x 3) (Person of Interest)
author: Person of Interest Clips
description: This is the scene where sameen shaw is all dressed up and nicely in the art gallery and fights off some assassins that were after the person of interest in this episode. According to what I've heard from one of her interviews she said this scene was very hard to do cause she had to literally fight while wearing 5 inch stilettos.
